languages.text: {n}Отрешенный взгляд Ирлиэт скользит по вашей шее.{/n} "Сколь велика пропасть между нами. Когда-то я стремилась прочь от уз и оков мира-корабля. Ты же добровольно позволил{mf||а} Темному оставить на тебе свою отметину — не только в душе, но и на теле".

{n}Yrliet's eyes track down your neck, staring blankly.{/n} "How great is the gulf between us. I once strove to escape the bonds and shackles of my craftworld. You, however, readily allowed a Dark One to leave his mark on you — not only in your soul, but on your body as well."
languages.original_text: {n}Отрешенный взгляд Ирлиэт скользит по вашей шее.{/n} "Сколь велика пропасть между нами. Когда-то я стремилась прочь от уз и оков мира-корабля. Ты же добровольно позволил{mf||а} Темному оставить на тебе свою отметину — не только в душе, но и на теле".

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet's eyes track down your neck, staring blankly.{/n} "How great is the gulf between us. I once strove to escape the bonds and shackles of my craftworld. You, however, readily allowed a Dark One to leave his mark on you — not only in your soul, but on your body as well."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}La mirada de Yrliet desciende por tu cuello sin mostrar emoción alguna.{/n} «Cuán inmenso es el abismo que nos separa. Una vez pugné por liberarme de las ataduras y grilletes de mi mundo astronave. Tú, sin embargo, permites que un oscuro te marque... no solo en tu alma, sino también en tu cuerpo».
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet's eyes track down your neck, staring blankly.{/n} "How great is the gulf between us. I once strove to escape the bonds and shackles of my craftworld. You, however, readily allowed a Dark One to leave his mark on you — not only in your soul, but on your body as well."

traits.locale_text: {n}La mirada de Yrliet desciende por tu cuello sin mostrar emoción alguna.{/n} «Cuán inmenso es el abismo que nos separa. Una vez pugné por liberarme de las ataduras y grilletes de mi mundo astronave. Tú, sin embargo, permites que un oscuro te marque... no solo en tu alma, sino también en tu cuerpo».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}ユリエットの目はこちらの首筋を追い、ぼんやりと見つめている。{/n}「我らの間には大きな溝がある。我はかつて方舟の束縛から逃れようと努力したが、お前は闇の者にいともたやすく痕跡を残させた。魂だけでなく、肉体にも」
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet's eyes track down your neck, staring blankly.{/n} "How great is the gulf between us. I once strove to escape the bonds and shackles of my craftworld. You, however, readily allowed a Dark One to leave his mark on you — not only in your soul, but on your body as well."

traits.locale_text: {n}ユリエットの目はこちらの首筋を追い、ぼんやりと見つめている。{/n}「我らの間には大きな溝がある。我はかつて方舟の束縛から逃れようと努力したが、お前は闇の者にいともたやすく痕跡を残させた。魂だけでなく、肉体にも」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}伊莉耶特的目光顺着你的脖子往下看，茫然地盯着你。{/n}“看看我们之间的鸿沟有多大吧。我曾努力抗争，只为了摆脱我的方舟世界施加在我身上的束缚和枷锁。可你，你却欣然允许黑暗的子嗣在你身上留下他的印记，不仅仅是灵魂层面，还包括你的肉体。”
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet's eyes track down your neck, staring blankly.{/n} "How great is the gulf between us. I once strove to escape the bonds and shackles of my craftworld. You, however, readily allowed a Dark One to leave his mark on you — not only in your soul, but on your body as well."

traits.locale_text: {n}伊莉耶特的目光顺着你的脖子往下看，茫然地盯着你。{/n}“看看我们之间的鸿沟有多大吧。我曾努力抗争，只为了摆脱我的方舟世界施加在我身上的束缚和枷锁。可你，你却欣然允许黑暗的子嗣在你身上留下他的印记，不仅仅是灵魂层面，还包括你的肉体。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Le regard inexpressif d'Yrliet descend le long de votre cou.{/n} « Vaste est le gouffre qui nous sépare. Il fut un temps où je m'efforçais de me libérer des entraves de mon vaisseau-monde, mais vous avez délibérément laissé un Drukhari apposer sa marque sur vous... Non seulement sur votre âme, mais aussi sur votre corps. »
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet's eyes track down your neck, staring blankly.{/n} "How great is the gulf between us. I once strove to escape the bonds and shackles of my craftworld. You, however, readily allowed a Dark One to leave his mark on you — not only in your soul, but on your body as well."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le regard inexpressif d'Yrliet descend le long de votre cou.{/n} « Vaste est le gouffre qui nous sépare. Il fut un temps où je m'efforçais de me libérer des entraves de mon vaisseau-monde, mais vous avez délibérément laissé un Drukhari apposer sa marque sur vous... Non seulement sur votre âme, mais aussi sur votre corps. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliets Blick gleitet deinen Hals hinab, starrt dich unverhohlen an.{/n} "Wie groß doch die Kluft zwischen uns ist. Ich habe einst danach gestrebt, die Bande und Fesseln meines Weltenschiffs abzulegen. Ihr dagegen habt bereitwillig einem Dunklen gestattet, sein Mal auf Euch zu hinterlassen — nicht nur auf Eurer Seele, sondern auch auf Eurem Körper."
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet's eyes track down your neck, staring blankly.{/n} "How great is the gulf between us. I once strove to escape the bonds and shackles of my craftworld. You, however, readily allowed a Dark One to leave his mark on you — not only in your soul, but on your body as well."

Ich habe einst danach gestrebt, die Bande und Fesseln meines Weltenschiffs abzulegen. Ihr dagegen habt bereitwillig einem Dunklen gestattet, sein Mal auf Euch zu hinterlassen — nicht nur auf Eurer Seele, sondern auch auf Eurem Körper."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet's eyes track down your neck, staring blankly.{/n} "How great is the gulf between us. I once strove to escape the bonds and shackles of my craftworld. You, however, readily allowed a Dark One to leave his mark on you — not only in your soul, but on your body as well."

languages.text: {n}Yrliet'in boş bakan gözleri, boynuna odaklanıyor.{/n} "Aramızdaki uçurum ne kadar da derin. Bir vakitler gemidünyamdaki bağlardan ve zincirlerden kurtulmak için çaba sarf ederdim. Ancak sen, bir Kara'nın üzerinde işaretini bırakmasına izin verdin. Hem de bu işareti sadece ruhunda değil, bedeninde de taşıyorsun."
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet's eyes track down your neck, staring blankly.{/n} "How great is the gulf between us. I once strove to escape the bonds and shackles of my craftworld. You, however, readily allowed a Dark One to leave his mark on you — not only in your soul, but on your body as well."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet'in ifadesizce bakan gözleri boynuna odaklanıyor.{/n} "Aramızdaki uçurum ne kadar da derin. Bir vakitler gemidünyamdaki bağlardan ve zincirlerden kurtulmak için çaba sarf ederdim. Ancak sen, bir Kara'nın üzerinde işaretini bırakmasına izin verdin. Hem de bu işareti sadece ruhunda değil, bedeninde de taşıyorsun."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
